string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: What is the difference between compiled and interpreted programming languages?
What is an API (Application Programming Interface), and how is it used in programming?
What is version control, and why is it essential for collaborative software development?
What is the difference between procedural programming and object-oriented programming?
Explain the concept of recursion in programming. How does it work?
What is a data structure, and what are some common types used in programming?
What are design patterns, and how do they help in software development?
What is a database, and how is it used in programming?
What is multithreading, and why is it useful in programming?
Explain the significance of the "Big O" notation in analyzing the time and space complexity of algorithms.
What is a cybersecurity vulnerability, and why is it critical to address them in programming?
